contents.text: The backend has been switched from Powercord to Replugged!
list: You will need to log in again under Settings > Replugged > General Settings in order to access the backend or use Spotify.
Added profile badge for people who boost the [Replugged Discord Server](https://discord.gg/replugged) (thank you all!)

contents.text: Built-in plugins are no longer built-in
The following built-in plugins have been moved to separate repositories:
These plugins (and more) can be downloaded from #plugin-links in the [Replugged Discord Server](https://discord.gg/replugged).
